function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential inter-species transmission of novel coronavirus in shared landscapes","Impact":"Threat to the health of wildlife and potential for cross-species transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict control measures and monitoring in shared landscapes to minimize contact between wildlife and humans","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, remote monitoring, and enforcement technologies","People":"Chimpanzees and other wildlife in shared landscapes","Owner":"Conservation organizations and local authorities"},{"Description":"Loss of funds for conservation areas due to temporary cessation of international tourism","Impact":"Financial strain on protected areas, leading to compromised conservation efforts and habitat integrity","Mitigation":"Diversify funding sources, implement cost-saving measures, and seek financial support from government and donors","Technologies":"Online fundraising platforms, financial management software, and remote work technologies","People":"Protected areas and conservation organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Impact on community engagement events and fundraising for conservation projects","Impact":"Reduced funds for conservation projects and decreased public awareness and involvement in conservation efforts","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual engagement strategies, explore alternative fundraising methods, and adapt community events to online platforms","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, social media outreach, and online fundraising tools","People":"Community members and conservation organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations and community leaders"}]}
